name: Master Sculptor
description:
This game was created within the "Summer Lab 2016", a workshop by the educational institute Image Campus (http://www.imagecampus.edu.ar) whose goal was to develop and publish a simple but complete videogame in a month using resources from the institute.

This game was created by students from the different careers and courses offered by the institute -such as Game Design, Videogame Development, 3D Modelling and Animation, and Game Art- and they were guided and assisted by professors.
